video:video.video:title: How to migrate from AWS to Azure using Azure Migrate
video:video.video:description: Watch how to set up and configure Azure Migrate to easily convert your existing Amazon EC2 instances into Azure VMs.

video:video.video:title: How to deploy machine learning models on Google's AI Platform
video:video.video:description: Follow along with this video demo, which walks through how to build and deploy machine learning models on Google Cloud with the scikit-learn framework.

video:video.video:title: Get started with this AWS IoT tutorial for beginners
video:video.video:description: Learn how to connect a device to AWS IoT Core in this video tutorial. Go through the IoT connection, workflow and security process to get your fleet of devices up and running.

video:video.video:title: Watch this Azure Arc tutorial on hybrid cloud management
video:video.video:description: Get to know Microsoft's hybrid cloud service. Learn to use Azure Arc to connect a local machine to Azure, apply configuration policies and check configurations.

video:video.video:title: Learn to run a CI pipeline with this Google Cloud Build tutorial
video:video.video:description: Follow this Google Cloud Build tutorial to build a continuous integration pipeline in Google Cloud. Incorporate Cloud Build with Cloud Source Repositories to make it work.

video:video.video:title: Watch this Google Cloud Console tutorial
video:video.video:description: Get accustomed to the Google Cloud Console. Explore the management features the admin UI has to offer and learn how to customize it to meet your needs.

video:video.video:title: Get started with this Azure cloud migration tool
video:video.video:description: There are a lot of moving parts to a cloud migration, which leaves a lot of room for error. Follow Douglas Francis as he demonstrates how to seamlessly migrate to Microsoft Azure.

video:video.video:title: How to build Azure Functions with PowerShell
video:video.video:description: Follow along with Anthony Howell as he gives a step-by-step demonstration to help you use PowerShell to kick start your Azure Functions app.

video:video.video:title: How to set up a CI/CD pipeline in the Azure DevOps console
video:video.video:description: Follow the steps in this how-to video from Matt Browne of TechSnips to quickly get your web app up and running on Microsoft Azure with a CI/CD pipeline.
